channel.title: DDR's Gallery
channel.description: Updates to DDR's gallery. Get notified of new projects!

item.title: Added a few things I worked on at EA to the gallery.
item.description: In Full: "Between 2021 and 2025 I worked at Electronic Arts Inc. Initially I worked on FIFA 22 as a UI engineer, but after release moved to Skate where I am currently a tools engineer."

item.title: Fixed easter egg not responding to clicks.
item.description: Some CSS had disabled input for the easter egg.

item.title: Added two projects to gallery.
item.description: Added two projects to gallery, the Chronos Camera UI and old Cityecho. This brings the gallery fully up to date again.

item.title: Added two small side-projects to gallery.
item.description: I have built an accessible, multi-player dice roller and a tiny periodic reminder tool, both added to the final section of the gallery.

item.title: Added another side-project to gallery.
item.description: Added the Visual Emoji Tester side-project, and took another stab at the periodic reminder tool.
